divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my boy was coming back from a Basketall game and I was driving on Hwy 2005 between Hamilton and Goldthwaite when I noticed a shape like a Tower with Red Lights, at first I did not think anything about it, but it just went away and I thought the lights had gone out on the tower. I even pulled over to take a look. The object looked like it was still like a tower not moving, but I really did not look at it very hard until I noticed it was just gone. I have been by there several times since, both daytime and night, no tower in that area ? I also read where a person seen the same thing in McCullogh couty as well. I would have not posted this but I have been seeing the UFO sightings in Stephenville and wondered if this was the same thing.
Summary: Seen what looked like a tower at first near Hamilton
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Hamilton
There were no other sightings in Hamilton on or around December 10th 2007
